CustomField.description: Closed: The rule applies to past dates and all compensations have been created. No modifications can be made. Active: The rule applies to past and future dates. Some compensations have been created and only limited modifications can be made. Users can change the ‘End Date’ of the rule only. Pending: The rule applies to future dates and compensations have not yet been created. All modifications can be made
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Closed: Rule applied in the past.No modifications can be made. Active: Rule active now. Limited modifications can be made. Users can change the ‘End Date’ of the rule only Pending: Rule is not yet applied. All modifications can be made.
CustomField.label: Status
